nodes.text: Bahima was a male Bith bartender in the Iziz cantina during the Onderon Civil War. In 3951 BBY, he owned S-0D3-GE3, and assisted Meetra Surik during her investigation of Captain Sullio's murder. According to some of his patrons, Bahima had an ever-growing problem with keeping his droids activated and on his property.
If Surik has fallen far down the dark side, Bahima will mention that the Bith have excellent skin creams that can make Surik look like a Human in his/her prime.
